title: NYPD's taking Rutgers, a professor of psychic evaluation on political Twitter?
subtitle: Kevin Alred, who studies women ' s and gender studies in Rutgers, said that his rights to the First Amendment had been violated when he was detained by the police for a rhetorical tweet about shooting eggs.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: A professor at Rutgers University was forced to make a psychological assessment because of political tweeting.
